Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.protocol

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.protocol.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LookupRequest, PutRequest, RemoveRequest, ShutdownRequest, UnknownRequest
    public abstract class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestI
    The abstract class Request is inherited by all classes representing a request in the global registry protocol.

    Description

    Part of an implementation of the Command design pattern.

    The global registry uses a string-oriented socket-based protocol with the following requests and responses: 

     Requests              Responses
 
 lookup key            lookup ok value
                       lookup nok key
 put key value         put ok
                       put nok key
 remove key            remove ok
                       remove nok key
 shutdown              shutdown ok
 anything else         error request

    The subclasses of this abstract class represents the possible requests.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-06-16

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
